author: Etty Hillesum
message: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mohandas Gandhi
message: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self-giving love.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Londen
message: To ensure good health: eat lightly, breathe deeply, live moderately, cultivate cheerfulness, and maintain an interest in life.
title: Thought of the day

message: Most smiles are started by another smile.
title: Thought of the day
